awd_titl_txt: RUI:  Enhancing VLSI Circuit Yields Through Identifying     Design Sensitivities
awd_abstract_narration: This grant funds the development of a software tool for the                     statistical analysis of integrated circuit failures.  The tool will             be used on existing failure rate data to locate unpredicted                     combinations of circuit parameters that produce failure.                        Statistical methods are necessary because of the randomness in                  failure data and the very large number of parameters which interact             to as yet poorly understood ways.  These parameter combinations                 yield insight on the nature of those interactions.  This insight                will be systematized using artificial intelligence techniques.
org_dir_long_name: Directorate for Computer and Information Science and Engineering
